channel.title: The Psychic Connection Radio Show
channel.itunes:subtitle: Learn to heal your life with Tarot based healing
channel.itunes:author: David O'Reilly M.Sc B.Sc
channel.itunes:summary: Learn to love and approve of yourself, dissolve and release blocks, attract abundance and prosperity, discover & disolve barriers and create the future you really want. Recorded live from Ireland's biggest Psychic radio show The Psychic Connection with Irishtarot.com on Sunshine 106.8FM, this unique show has become not only Ireland's most popular self-help programme but also worldwide on Podcast. Don't forget to email your podcast questions to david@irishtarot.com to be answered on next Sunday's show!
channel.description: Irishtarot.com's very own Tarot show, The Psychic Connection is broadcast live from Ireland on Dublin's Country Mix 106.8FM Radio every Sunday at 10pm Irish Time, and captured to Podcast every week for you to listen to whenever you like! Packed full of FREE Tarot readings, psychic essentials, holistic and personal growth readings and lots lots more! if you like Tarot and healing with a metaphysical twist then this is the show for you!
